tool_description: Creates and stores comprehensive client profiles with contact information, preferences, and session requirements for portrait photography bookings.

client_name.description: Full name of the client requesting portrait services

email.description: Primary email address for client communication

phone.description: Primary phone number including area code

session_type.description: Type of portrait session: individual, couple, family, corporate, maternity, engagement

error_messages: Invalid email format: Provide a valid email address with @ symbol and domain.
Invalid session type: Use one of [individual, couple, family, corporate, maternity, engagement].
Invalid budget range: Use one of [under_500, 500_1000, 1000_2000, 2000_plus].
Missing required contact info: Both email and phone must be provided.
usage: Provide client_name, email, phone, and session_type to create a new client profile. Optionally include budget_range for better service matching.

client_id.description: Unique identifier for the created client profile

profile_status.description: Status of profile creation: created, updated, or duplicate

creation_timestamp.description: When the profile was created in ISO 8601 format
